model.agent.classification
Class Classifier

java.lang.Object
  model.agent.classification.Classifier

public class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used by agents to classify their current status. Trained instances will be saved into an XML file, and reloaded when the same classifier (i.e. of the same agentType and the same attributes) is instantiated again.

Author:
Gerben G. Meyer

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new classifier.

          Adds a new instance to the set of training instances used by the classifier.

          Returns the status most appropriate status based on the provided instance.
 java.lang.String toArff(boolean includeData)
          Returns an ARFF string representing the used training data with all used attributes, and optionally, with all training data.

Constructor Detail

Classifier

public Classifier(java.lang.String agentType,
                  java.lang.String arffAttributes)
Creates a new classifier.

Parameters:
agentType - the agent type which will use this classifier
arffAttributes - ARFF representation of the attributes of the agents using this classifier

Adds a new instance to the set of training instances used by the classifier.

Parameters:
arffInstance - ARFF representation of the new instance
status - The trained status

getStatus

public AgentStatus getStatus(java.lang.String arffInstance)
Returns the status most appropriate status based on the provided instance.

Parameters:
arffInstance - ARFF representation of the to be classified instance
Returns:
The most appropriate status

toArff

public java.lang.String toArff(boolean includeData)
Returns an ARFF string representing the used training data with all used attributes, and optionally, with all training data.

Parameters:
includeData - Boolean determining whether to include all training data or not
Returns:
the ARFF string
